text:
piqtarO&nuq prasa#rpantiq ta E#namISvaqrA hi(gm)si#tOqH sada#H praqsRupya# dakShiNAqrddhaM parE$kShEqtA&ga#nta pitaraH pitRuqmAnaqhaM ~MyuqShmABi#rBUyAsa(gm) supraqjasOq mayA# yUqyaM BU#yAqstEtiq tEBya# Eqva na#maqskRutyaq sadaqH prasa#rpatyAqtmanO&nA$rtyai || 15
(maqKO - vA - aqntari#kShAt - praqsarpa#ntaqM - traya#stri(gm)Sacca) (A4)
